verses.name: Psalms 45:10
verses.text: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father’s house;

verses.name: Psalms 45:11
verses.text: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.

verses.name: Psalms 45:12
verses.text: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.

verses.name: Psalms 45:13
verses.text: The king’s daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.

verses.name: Psalms 45:14
verses.text: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.
